Description: Focus on achieving the AWS Solutions Architect – Professional certification.
Study foundational AWS services including EC2, S3, and IAM.
Learn about EC2 instance types, pricing, and use cases. Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/concepts.html

Summary: Launch and Connect to an EC2 Instance
Description: Launch an EC2 instance in AWS Management Console and connect via SSH. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/getting-started/hands-on/launch-an-ec2-instance/
Understand S3 bucket concepts, object storage, and security options. Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/Welcome.html

Summary: Enable Versioning on an S3 Bucket
Description: Enable versioning on a new S3 bucket and upload sample files. Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/Versioning.html
Create and document portfolio-ready projects aligned with certifications.
Design an AWS architecture diagram incorporating EC2, S3, and IAM roles.

Summary: Design a Simple Architecture with EC2 and S3
Description: Use Lucidchart or Diagrams.net to design an architecture with EC2 and S3 integration.

Summary: Document IAM Roles and Policies in the Diagram
Description: Add IAM roles and policies for secure EC2-S3 access in the architecture diagram.
